Anyone with more than one currency, will ALWAYS spend the one they consider weakest first when making a purchase. This leads to the strongest money taking over as the ONLY money. Currencies CAN'T co-exist in meaningful ratio. Bitcoin is that money and it is called Gresham's Law.
